item.title: [onc] Phyrexian Swarmlord
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Insect Horror

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 green Phyrexian Insect creature token with infect for each poison counter your opponents have.

item.title: [onc] Noxious Revival
item.description:
Instant

({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)

Put target card from a graveyard on top of its owner's library.

item.title: [onc] Adriana, Captain of the Guard
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Knight

Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)

Other creatures you control have melee. (If a creature has multiple instances of melee, each triggers separately.)

item.title: [onc] Merciless Eviction
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Exile all artifacts.

• Exile all creatures.

• Exile all enchantments.

• Exile all planeswalkers.

item.title: [onc] Jor Kadeen, the Prevailer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

First strike

Metalcraft — Creatures you control get +3/+0 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

item.title: [onc] Heroic Reinforcements
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste. (They can attack and {T} this turn.)

item.title: [onc] Culling Ritual
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. Add {B} or {G} for each permanent destroyed this way.

item.title: [onc] Boros Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.

• Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

• Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Assemble the Legion
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a muster counter on Assemble the Legion. Then create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste for each muster counter on Assemble the Legion.

item.title: [onc] Rip Apart
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Rip Apart deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [onc] Putrefy
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.title: [onc] Mortify
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature or enchantment.

item.title: [onc] Moldervine Reclamation
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

item.title: [onc] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [onc] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [onc] Chromatic Lantern
item.description:

Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Artifact

item.title: [onc] Ichorclaw Myr
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Myr

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

Whenever Ichorclaw Myr becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Grafted Exoskeleton
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

Whenever Grafted Exoskeleton becomes unattached from a permanent, sacrifice that permanent.

Equip {2}

item.description:
Artifact

When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [onc] Myr Battlesphere
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Myr Construct

When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.

Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

item.title: [onc] Mask of Memory
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard a card.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [onc] Loxodon Warhammer
item.description:

item.title: [onc] Idol of Oblivion
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you created a token this turn.

{8}, {T}, Sacrifice Idol of Oblivion: Create a 10/10 colorless Eldrazi creature token.

item.title: [onc] Trailblazer's Boots
item.description:

item.title: [onc] Solemn Simulacrum
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.
